body:
Spotlight PA is an independent, nonpartisan newsroom powered by The Philadelphia Inquirer in partnership with PennLive/The Patriot-News, TribLIVE/Pittsburgh Tribune-Review, and WITF Public Media. Sign up for our free newsletters. HARRISBURG — WHILE YOU’RE HERE… If you learned something from this story, pay it forward and become a member of Spotlight PA so someone else can in the future at spotlightpa.org/donate. Spotlight PA is funded by foundations and readers like you who are committed to accountability journalism that gets results. \[DELETE BELOW/FOR TEMPLATE PURPOSES ONLY\] USE REAL HEADINGS, NOT JUST BOLD TEXT:

Heading 1: Mostly don’t use this because the title is h1

Heading 2: Mostly just use this for subheds.

H3: Sub-subheds.

H4: Sub-sub-subhed.

Table information TO EMBED HTML
TO ADD ADDITIONAL IMAGE {{}} TO HIDE TEXT FROM FINAL COPY: TO ADD A TABLE OF CONTENTS, USE REAL HEADINGS AND ADD: ### Contents - Heading 1: Mostly don’t use this because the title is h1 - Heading 2: Mostly just use this for subheds. - H3: Sub-subheds. - H4: Sub-sub-subhed. TO ADD A PLAIN TABLE (Note that plain tables do not work well on mobile. Prefer to use table embeds from Datawrapper or Flourish):

a

b

c

1

2

3
